{{cpp/types/type_info/title|before}}
{{cpp/types/type_info/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcla|anchor=no|noexcept=c++11|1=
bool before( const type_info&amp; rhs ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns {{c|true}} if the type of this {{tt|type_info}} precedes the type of {{c|rhs}} in the implementation's collation order. No guarantees are given; in particular, the collation order can change between the invocations of the same program.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|another type information object to compare to}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the type of this {{tt|type_info}} precedes the type of {{c|rhs}} in the implementation's collation order.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;typeinfo&gt;

int main()
{
    if (typeid(int).before(typeid(char)))
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "int goes before char in this implementation.\n";
    else
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "char goes before int in this implementation.\n";
}
|p=true
|output=
char goes before int in this implementation.
}}
